alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern East Feliciana Parish through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clinton, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Wilson, Norwood and Felps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
